document.docAuthor: Alves, Philippe V., Vieira, Fabiano M., Santos, Cláudia P., Scholz, Tomáš & Luque, José L.
document.masterDocTitle: A Checklist of the Aspidogastrea (Platyhelminthes: Trematoda) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Checklist of the Aspidogastrea (Platyhelminthes: Trematoda) of the World

bibRefCitation.author: Baer
bibRefCitation.refString: Baer, K. E. (1826) Sur les Entozoaires ou vers intestinaux. Bulletin des Sciences Naturelles Geologie. Paris, 9, 123 - 126.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remark: Sequences of partial 28 S and partial 18 S in the GenBank database
AY 222162
(Olson et al . 2003 ),
AJ 287478
(
Littlewood et al . 2001 b
).

Remark: Described by
Achmerov ( 1956 )
as
A . amurensis
from this host and then reported from cyprinid fish
Ctenopharyngodon idella
,
Cyprinus carpio
and
Mylopharyngodon piceus
(
Nagibina & Timofeeva 1971
;
Gao et al . 2003
).

Cyrtonaias tampicoensis
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Disconaias fimbriata
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEO part; Mexico (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Friersonia iridella
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEO part; Mexico (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Fusconaia burkei
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Hyriopsis schlegelii
; freshwater; visceral mass; PAL; Japan (Asia) (
Syogaki 1936
).

Inversiunio reinianus
; freshwater; visceral mass; PAL; Japan (Asia) (
Syogaki 1936
).

Lampsilis hydiana
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Lampsilis ovata
; freshwater; pericardial and renal cavities, visceral mass; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Nelson et al . 1975
, Vitrine &
Causey 1975
;
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Lampsilis radiata
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Medionidus conradicus
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Remark: Sequences of partial 18 S, ITS- 1 , 5.8S , ITS- 2 and partial 28 S in the GenBank database
DQ 482608
(
Chen et al . 2007
);
DQ 345317
,
DQ 345318
(
Chen et al . 2010
).

Obovaria arkansasensis
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Potamilus amphichaenus
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Pseudanodonta elongata
; freshwater; pericardial and renal cavities; PAL; Ukraine (Europe) (
Pavljuchenko 2006
).

Ptychobranchus subtentum
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Pyganodon implicata
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Sinotaia quadrata
; freshwater; pericardial cavity; PAL; China (Asia) (
Tang & Tang 1980
).

Strophitus subvexus
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Theliderma cylindrica
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Tritogonia verrucosa
; freshwater; pericardial and renal cavities, visceral mass; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Kelly 1899
;
Dollfus 1958 b
;
Hendrix 1968
; Bates & van der
Schalie 1970
;
Stromberg 1970
;
Bailey & Tompkins 1971
; Vitrine 1973 ;
Nelson et al . 1975
; Vitrine &
Causey 1975
;
Williams 1978
,
Danford & Joy 1984
,
Huehner 1984
,
Hendrix et al. 1985
).

Utterbackia peggyae
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Villosa iris
; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Popenaias
sp.; freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEO part; Mexico (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Remark: Probably, the hosts belong to
Anodonta
genus, due the origin of material, which was the same of
Bakker & Diegenbach ( 1973 )
.

Bithynia tentaculata
; freshwater; mantle cavity; PAL; Russia (European part) (
Zhokhov & Gachina 1997
).

Remark:
C . bulimoides
is considered a complex of species (
Van Damme 2010
).

Semisulcospira ( Biwamelania ) multigranosa
; freshwater; soft tissues; PAL; Japan (Asia) (
Urabe 2003
).

Neogobius melanostomus
; brackish, freshwater; intestine; PAL; Russia (European part) (
Tyutin et al . 2013
).
